###### Major Positive reputation with [RDC](/royalDeadfireCompany/) | rewardname2 = Return after completing [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/) + Master Kua still alive | reward2 = Major Negative reputation with [RDC](/royalDeadfireCompany/);No longer able to ally with the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) during [The Coming Storm](/theComingStorm/) | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Overgrowth | conc = A Shrewd Proposition;Cruel Cargo;Fruitful Alliance | internalname = FCT_QST_RDC04_Slavers | guid = d94e8496-aed3-4122-be23-0dd52dfe17f8 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [faction quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsFactionQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis The Royal Deadfire Company wants to chase the slavers off of Crookspur Island. The port of Crookspur lies on the eastern side of an island northwest of Neketaka. ## Walkthrough {{Note|Failing this quest means you will not be able to side with the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) during [The Coming Storm](/theComingStorm/) / [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/). This should be kept in mind if you decide to help [Master Kua](/masterKua/) during [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/)!}} * After completing [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/), [Fleet Master Okaya](/fleetMasterOkaya/) will request that you speak with [Atsura](/atsura/) back at [Imperial Command](/imperialCommand/). Atsura explains that the RDC wants the slavers on Crookspur Island gone, and it's your job to make that happen. * This is a quest that can be tackled in a variety of ways, but ultimately requires purging the slavers from the island. For a detailed walkthrough, see the quest [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdPropositionAgainstCrookspur/). ** If you return to Atsura after completing [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/) you will automatically fail the quest and will receive major negative reputation with the RDC. Doing so will mean that you are no longer able to side with [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) during [The Coming Storm](/theComingStorm/) and [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/). ** However if you return to Atsura after killing [Master Kua](/masterKua/) (regardless of if you had completed Tip of the Spear or associated quests), you will '''not''' fail the quest. This is the only way to do both Furrante's side of A Shrewd Proposition (and extended quests), and Clearing Out Crookspur. ###### After killing Master Kua * After leaving Crookspur, you will be greeted by yet [another](/fromTheWreckage/) RDC fleet. This time, you will meet [Kana Rua](/kanaRua/) (he unfortunately is not voiced), who is tasked with securing the port of Crookspur against pirates and slavers. Kana will reminisce your adventures together in the Dyrwood, during {{poe1}}. Make sure to swap [Maia](/maia/) into your party for some added spice. * Return to [Atsura](/atsura/) in the [Imperial Command](/imperialCommand/) - Lower. You can question the RDC's haste sending warships to swoop in on Crookspur * After this quest, the Royal Deadfire Company will occupy Crookspur. This occurs 12 hours after handing in the quest. ## Kana Rua dialogue {| class="wikitable" ! Dialogue ! Referring to |- | ''"After, what, escaping that collapsing ice cavern?"'' | The events at [Cayron's Scar](/cayronsScar/) |- | ''"Defeating not one, but ''three'' dragons!"'' | Killing the [Alpine Dragon](/alpineDragon/), [Sky](/skyDragon/) [Dragon](/skyDragon/) and Adra Dragon |- | ''"Defeating a dragon hewn out of solid adra!"'' | Killing the Adra Dragon, [Sefyra](/sefyra/) |- | ''"After besting the Leaden Key?" or
"Besting the Leaden Key!"'' | Defeating [Thaos](/thaosIxArkannon/). |- | ''"Unveiling the forgotten language of the ancients!"'' | Learning the Engwithan language during [Undying Heritage](/undyingHeritage/) |- | ''"Thwarting the ''gods'' themselves!"'' | ? |} ## Notes * If you failed this quest, but still want to side with the RDC in [The Coming Storm](/theComingStorm/), use the console command [SetGlobalValue](/consoleSetGlobalValue/) b_RDC04_Returned_To_Atsura 1 before speaking to [Hazanui Karū](/hazanuiKaru/) (and ensure you have already completed [A Matter of Import](/aMatterOfImport/)). {{-}} ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_RDC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_RDC04_Slavers.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Clearing Out Crookspur''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Royal Deadfire Company wants to chase the slavers off of Crookspur Island. |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''Alternate descriptions''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40001 | Fleet Master Okaya told me that Atsura would like to speak to me about a new task. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40002 | Hazanui Karū told me that Atsura would like to speak to me about a new task. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Travel to Crookspur.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The port of Crookspur lies on the eastern side of an island northwest of Neketaka. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20008 | Atsura told me the Wahaki may also be interested in eliminating the slavers. I can find them on the island of Ori o Koīki. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | The Wahaki also asked me to get rid of the slavers. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20010 | I need to take care of this matter if I want to ally with the Royal Deadfire Company. |- | rowspan="9" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Find and kill Master Kua in Crookspur.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Atsura told me that killing Master Kua will send the rest of the slavers running. I just have to find him and confront him. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | I've been given an audience with Master Kua, who runs the operation on Crookspur. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20005 | Master Kua has given me access to the lower levels of Crookspur. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20006 | Crookspur has been put on high alert, and the fortress is on lockdown. The master will be harder to reach. A drawbridge also bars the main exit. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20007 | The merchant Seafol believes that slavers are peddling Deadfire locals. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20009 | A group of Wahaki slaves agreed to cause a distraction if I free them from their cell. The ogre taskmaster in the dungeon of Crookspur holds the keys to the their cell. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | The Wahaki have made good on their word and incited a revolt on Crookspur. The path to the master should be clear now. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | Instead of having Bauha start a revolt, I convinced her to escape back to Ori o Koīki. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Atsura at Imperial Command in the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I scared Kua into leaving Crookspur, and the remaining slavers are going with him. Atsura will be pleased I got rid of them. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''4''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Atsura at Imperial Command in the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10004 | I killed Master Kua, and the remaining slavers are leaving Crookspur. Atsura will be pleased I got rid of them. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''9''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak to Atsura in the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10009 | Atsura has another matter to discuss with me. He's waiting for me in his office at Imperial Command. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I have the weapons that were stolen from the Wahaki. With them, the captured warriors may be able to help me. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | The slavers are gone from Crookspur. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | The Royal Deadfire Company wants nothing more to do with me, so I won't be reporting back to them anytime soon. |}
